title: Why do stars from kids shows turn to singing like Selena Gomez? - Quora

response.answer_text: Disney kids have a hard time transitioning into adult actors so music usually is a side gig at first. The labels try to milk money as far as they can till the star is relevant. Music is targeted towards teen demographic and if the cards are played correctly such as in case of Selena Gomez music becomes a more stable career choice. If the stars can't make a name for themselves in music they struggle to break into Hollywood at times look at Miranda, Jenette and Vanessa.
